{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Wireless Solution Sales Engineer",
  "description": "Huawei is a leading global ICT solutions provider. Through our dedication to customer-centric innovation and strong partnerships, we have established end-to-end capabilities and strengths across the carrier networks, enterprise, consumer, and cloud computing fields. Our products and solutions have been deployed in over 170 countries, serving more than one third of the world&#39;s population.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Wireless Solution Sales Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Communications

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Wireless Solution Sales Engineer to join our team in Lagos, Nigeria.
	The successful candidate will take ownership of the sales of wireless products and solutions, ensuring the execution of targeted sales strategies and the achievement of business goals.
	This role involves working closely with regional customers, developing solution-based sales proposals, executing bidding strategies, and supporting business growth through market intelligence and customer engagement.


Key Responsibilities
Sales Ownership &amp; Strategy Implementation:


	Drive the implementation of sales strategies for specific wireless scenarios, products, and regional targets.
	Achieve operational targets related to installed base and centralized procurement share/price.


Customer Engagement &amp; Expansion:


	Analyze and gain insights from the local network landscape.
	Identify and drive board-level expansion projects within the region.
	Communicate effectively with mid-level and junior-level regional customers on product-level discussions to guide and shape customer requirements.


Bidding &amp; Project Management:


	Lead and manage single-scenario or single-source bidding projects.
	Develop and execute bidding strategies to ensure successful project acquisition and implementation.


Market Intelligence &amp; Competitive Analysis:


	Collect, monitor, and analyze competitive information and regional landscape.
	Maintain updated war maps and sandboxes to track industry trends, competitor activities, and inventory status.


Required Skills &amp; Experience


	Strong understanding of order management and sales project operations.
	Familiarity with account group structures and customer relationship management.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to guide customers effectively.
	Strong teamwork spirit and collaboration skills.


Required Abilities:


	Ability to understand complex customer requirements and translate them into tailored wireless solutions.
	Skilled in designing technical and commercial solutions.
	Capable of engaging in customer-facing roles to influence decision-making and solution adoption.
	Strong capability in operating and managing sales and bidding projects.


Professional Experience:


	Relevant experience in ICT products, with a strong preference for experience in the wireless field.
	Experience in pre-sales solution design and expansion, or background in delivery technology and commercial design is an added advantage.


Technical Knowledge &amp; Background:


	In-depth knowledge of wireless technologies, network architecture, and related products.
	Understanding of solution design principles, customer interaction, and project delivery.
	&nbsp;Exposure to business management, business model design, and digital marketing is desirable.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;nigeriahr23@huawei.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2026-02-17",
  "validThrough": "2026-03-28",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Huawei"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "194664"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Wireless Solution Sales Engineer Job at Huawei




        
    

        
        Huawei is a leading global ICT solutions provider. Through our dedication to customer-centric innovation and strong partnerships, we have established end-to-end capabilities and strengths across the carrier networks, enterprise, consumer, and cloud computing fields. Our products and solutions have been deployed in over 170 countries, serving more than one third of the world's population.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Wireless Solution Sales Engineer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Communications

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Wireless Solution Sales Engineer to join our team in Lagos, Nigeria.
	The successful candidate will take ownership of the sales of wireless products and solutions, ensuring the execution of targeted sales strategies and the achievement of business goals.
	This role involves working closely with regional customers, developing solution-based sales proposals, executing bidding strategies, and supporting business growth through market intelligence and customer engagement.


Key Responsibilities
Sales Ownership & Strategy Implementation:


	Drive the implementation of sales strategies for specific wireless scenarios, products, and regional targets.
	Achieve operational targets related to installed base and centralized procurement share/price.


Customer Engagement & Expansion:


	Analyze and gain insights from the local network landscape.
	Identify and drive board-level expansion projects within the region.
	Communicate effectively with mid-level and junior-level regional customers on product-level discussions to guide and shape customer requirements.


Bidding & Project Management:


	Lead and manage single-scenario or single-source bidding projects.
	Develop and execute bidding strategies to ensure successful project acquisition and implementation.


Market Intelligence & Competitive Analysis:


	Collect, monitor, and analyze competitive information and regional landscape.
	Maintain updated war maps and sandboxes to track industry trends, competitor activities, and inventory status.


Required Skills & Experience


	Strong understanding of order management and sales project operations.
	Familiarity with account group structures and customer relationship management.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to guide customers effectively.
	Strong teamwork spirit and collaboration skills.


Required Abilities:


	Ability to understand complex customer requirements and translate them into tailored wireless solutions.
	Skilled in designing technical and commercial solutions.
	Capable of engaging in customer-facing roles to influence decision-making and solution adoption.
	Strong capability in operating and managing sales and bidding projects.


Professional Experience:


	Relevant experience in ICT products, with a strong preference for experience in the wireless field.
	Experience in pre-sales solution design and expansion, or background in delivery technology and commercial design is an added advantage.


Technical Knowledge & Background:


	In-depth knowledge of wireless technologies, network architecture, and related products.
	Understanding of solution design principles, customer interaction, and project delivery.
	 Exposure to business management, business model design, and digital marketing is desirable.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: nigeriahr23@huawei.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "IT (Marketing) Manager",
  "description": "Asper Auto Auction Nigeria Limited -&nbsp;Founded in 2022 in Lagos, Nigeria, Asper is a proudly African innovation dedicated to transforming auto remarketing across the continent. Headquartered at 130 Muritala Mohammed Way, Ebute Metta, Lagos, with an international office in Riverdale, Georgia, USA, Asper delivers a modern, technology-driven solution for vehicle auctions.

Its Virtual Bidding Platform (VBP1)&mdash;the first of its kind in Africa&mdash;has set the benchmark for online auto remarketing. By removing the need for physical attendance, Asper ensures auctions are more accessible, transparent, and efficient for both sellers and buyers.

Asper is prospecting to establish 10 operational locations across Africa, positioning itself as a future leader in online vehicle auctions. The company aims to connect insurance firms, government agencies, banks, fleet operators, and other sellers with a diverse buyer base&mdash;including Tokunbo buyers, dismantlers, rebuilders, dealers, exporters, and the general public. www.asperauction.com/career.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;IT (Marketing) Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We&rsquo;re seeking a results-driven and creative Marketing Manager who understands the pulse of the Nigerian market.
	You&rsquo;ll be responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies that boost brand visibility, generate leads, and drive sales across our vehicle lineup.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement integrated marketing campaigns across digital, print, and outdoor media
	Lead product launch strategies and promotional events for new vehicle models
	Manage social media platforms, SEO/SEM, and paid advertising campaigns
	Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify growth opportunities
	Collaborate with sales and service teams to align marketing efforts with business goals
	Monitor campaign performance and report on KPIs and ROI
	Manage relationships with external agencies, media partners, and vendors
	Oversee the creation of marketing materials including brochures, billboards, and showroom displays


Qualifications and Experience


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Business, or related fields
	Minimum of 5 years of marketing experience, preferably in the automotive or FMCG sector
	Experience: Vehicle Inspection / Agent : 1 year (Preferred)
	Strong knowledge of digital marketing tools and analytics platforms
	Excellent communication, leadership, and project management skills
	Creative mindset with a passion for brand storytelling and customer engagement.


Pay
N50,000.00 - N200,000.00 per month + Commission.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;asperauction@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

IT (Marketing) Manager Job at Asper Auto Auction Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Asper Auto Auction Nigeria Limited - Founded in 2022 in Lagos, Nigeria, Asper is a proudly African innovation dedicated to transforming auto remarketing across the continent. Headquartered at 130 Muritala Mohammed Way, Ebute Metta, Lagos, with an international office in Riverdale, Georgia, USA, Asper delivers a modern, technology-driven solution for vehicle auctions.

Its Virtual Bidding Platform (VBP1)—the first of its kind in Africa—has set the benchmark for online auto remarketing. By removing the need for physical attendance, Asper ensures auctions are more accessible, transparent, and efficient for both sellers and buyers.
     

            
    



Asper is prospecting to establish 10 operational locations across Africa, positioning itself as a future leader in online vehicle auctions. The company aims to connect insurance firms, government agencies, banks, fleet operators, and other sellers with a diverse buyer base—including Tokunbo buyers, dismantlers, rebuilders, dealers, exporters, and the general public. www.asperauction.com/career.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT (Marketing) Manager

Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We’re seeking a results-driven and creative Marketing Manager who understands the pulse of the Nigerian market.
	You’ll be responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies that boost brand visibility, generate leads, and drive sales across our vehicle lineup.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement integrated marketing campaigns across digital, print, and outdoor media
	Lead product launch strategies and promotional events for new vehicle models
	Manage social media platforms, SEO/SEM, and paid advertising campaigns
	Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify growth opportunities
	Collaborate with sales and service teams to align marketing efforts with business goals
	Monitor campaign performance and report on KPIs and ROI
	Manage relationships with external agencies, media partners, and vendors
	Oversee the creation of marketing materials including brochures, billboards, and showroom displays


Qualifications and Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business, or related fields
	Minimum of 5 years of marketing experience, preferably in the automotive or FMCG sector
	Experience: Vehicle Inspection / Agent : 1 year (Preferred)
	Strong knowledge of digital marketing tools and analytics platforms
	Excellent communication, leadership, and project management skills
	Creative mindset with a passion for brand storytelling and customer engagement.


Pay
N50,000.00 - N200,000.00 per month + Commission.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: asperauction@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "description": "NewGlobe supports visionary governments to transform public education systems, the cornerstone of a prosperous, equitable, and peaceful society. We are&nbsp;recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Full-Stack Engineer, Software Development (Core focus :- .NET)

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The Managing Director is responsible for providing overall leadership management and general technical direction of the entire program, ensuring an integrated vision among different components, functions and stakeholders, and a focus on achieving the results defined in the contract.
	You will be responsible for leading and overseeing the development, delivery and day-to-day management of a high quality, innovative, cost effective and sustainable education program resulting in immediate and lasting change for children and building the capacity of the duty bearers.
	This is a highly hands-on job, involving intense program management, broad technical knowledge covering financial management, supply chain, government relations and school operations management.
	For this role, we need someone who has the experience of managing highly complex and large programs with a lean team coupled with a deep passion for programme mission. Leadership, humility and self-awareness are a must to be successful.
	This is an incredibly fast-paced and absorbing role that will ask a lot of you but it will also be personally rewarding in that you will see the impact of your efforts first hand.


What You Will Do


	Act as the senior General Manager for the program, overseeing budgets, strategic and operational delivery and stakeholder management.
	Lead and manage the program team &ndash; providing the vision, day-to-day coordination, resource management, and supervision required to accomplish project objectives and to deliver superior quality products.
	Be the primary liaison with the designated Ministry of Education, State Universal Basic Education Board (SUBEB) and elected political champions and his or her representatives, responding to client needs within the limits of the arrangement.
	Ensure quality control and the overall responsiveness of technical assistance provided, including necessary adjustments to operations to fit the requirements of the programme.
	Identify issues and risks related to program implementation in a timely manner, and suggest appropriate program adjustments.
	Ensure the technical and methodological soundness of activities and, in collaboration with the Collaborate with colleagues to solve problems and build a learning environment within the program team and other function heads of the organization.
	Responsible for on or under-budget delivery of all aspects of the programme.&nbsp;


What You Should Have


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree essential, MBA (or Master&rsquo;s) would be preferred.
	At least 10 years of progressively responsible experience working in project management and design in developing countries, preferably including experience in the state or country to which you will be assigned.
	At least 5 years of management experience, including direct supervision of professional and support staff and assembling teams working in multi-faceted roles including field based roles.
	A proven track record of excelling in the leadership of operational teams, as well as in design-thinking, process and system design and application, managing complex and inter-related functions, as this will be critical overseeing a large scale school system transformation.
	Prior experience within a fast-paced, high-growth, metric-driven operational organization will be an advantage.
	Strong management skills, leadership qualities, professional reputation, ability to build or access key contacts within the Ministry of Education or equivalent local and state regulatory bodies.
	Demonstrated ability to work effectively with government representatives, for-profit private sector entities, local community organizations, donors, consortium members and other stakeholders, at national and sub-national levels.
	Respect and sensitivity towards cultural, gender, ethnicity and religious diversity.
	Maturity and confidence in dealing with high ranking officials of government institutions, international institutions and non-government institutions.
	Demonstrated excellent communications and writing abilities and superior interpersonal and cross-cultural communication skills.
	Demonstrated hands-on experience in building the Ministry of Education (or other relevant Government entity) and devolved structures capacity in developing and realizing education strategic plans to provide quality Education services is a plus.
	Passion for our vision of democratizing the right for all children to succeed.

Full-Stack Engineer, Software Development (Core focus :- .NET) Job at NewGlobe




        
    

        
        NewGlobe supports visionary governments to transform public education systems, the cornerstone of a prosperous, equitable, and peaceful society. With a comprehensive system transformation platform and data-driven educational services, NewGlobe delivers rapid and dramatic improvements in learning outcomes at state and nationwide scale. Through building impactful partnerships and programmes, NewGlobe ensures that all children have access to an education that will develop their full potential and create a foundation for growth and prosperity.
     

            
    



NewGlobe leverages more than a decade of educational experience and proven impact in integrated school management, teacher professional development, instructional design innovation, technological system support, child-centered classroom practice, and parent engagement -  all grounded in learning science - to ensure each teacher is empowered to engage children in transformational learning, and all children have the opportunity to develop to their full potential. Every day, NewGlobe supports governments to solve what were once seen as intractable problems, and by doing so, ensures this generation will be able to grow up to lead more fulfilled lives, while simultaneously building economic prosperity for themselves, their communities, and the globe.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full-Stack Engineer, Software Development (Core focus :- .NET)

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The Managing Director is responsible for providing overall leadership management and general technical direction of the entire program, ensuring an integrated vision among different components, functions and stakeholders, and a focus on achieving the results defined in the contract.
	You will be responsible for leading and overseeing the development, delivery and day-to-day management of a high quality, innovative, cost effective and sustainable education program resulting in immediate and lasting change for children and building the capacity of the duty bearers.
	This is a highly hands-on job, involving intense program management, broad technical knowledge covering financial management, supply chain, government relations and school operations management.
	For this role, we need someone who has the experience of managing highly complex and large programs with a lean team coupled with a deep passion for programme mission. Leadership, humility and self-awareness are a must to be successful.
	This is an incredibly fast-paced and absorbing role that will ask a lot of you but it will also be personally rewarding in that you will see the impact of your efforts first hand.


What You Will Do


	Act as the senior General Manager for the program, overseeing budgets, strategic and operational delivery and stakeholder management.
	Lead and manage the program team – providing the vision, day-to-day coordination, resource management, and supervision required to accomplish project objectives and to deliver superior quality products.
	Be the primary liaison with the designated Ministry of Education, State Universal Basic Education Board (SUBEB) and elected political champions and his or her representatives, responding to client needs within the limits of the arrangement.
	Ensure quality control and the overall responsiveness of technical assistance provided, including necessary adjustments to operations to fit the requirements of the programme.
	Identify issues and risks related to program implementation in a timely manner, and suggest appropriate program adjustments.
	Ensure the technical and methodological soundness of activities and, in collaboration with the Collaborate with colleagues to solve problems and build a learning environment within the program team and other function heads of the organization.
	Responsible for on or under-budget delivery of all aspects of the programme. 


What You Should Have


	Bachelor’s degree essential, MBA (or Master’s) would be preferred.
	At least 10 years of progressively responsible experience working in project management and design in developing countries, preferably including experience in the state or country to which you will be assigned.
	At least 5 years of management experience, including direct supervision of professional and support staff and assembling teams working in multi-faceted roles including field based roles.
	A proven track record of excelling in the leadership of operational teams, as well as in design-thinking, process and system design and application, managing complex and inter-related functions, as this will be critical overseeing a large scale school system transformation.
	Prior experience within a fast-paced, high-growth, metric-driven operational organization will be an advantage.
	Strong management skills, leadership qualities, professional reputation, ability to build or access key contacts within the Ministry of Education or equivalent local and state regulatory bodies.
	Demonstrated ability to work effectively with government representatives, for-profit private sector entities, local community organizations, donors, consortium members and other stakeholders, at national and sub-national levels.
	Respect and sensitivity towards cultural, gender, ethnicity and religious diversity.
	Maturity and confidence in dealing with high ranking officials of government institutions, international institutions and non-government institutions.
	Demonstrated excellent communications and writing abilities and superior interpersonal and cross-cultural communication skills.
	Demonstrated hands-on experience in building the Ministry of Education (or other relevant Government entity) and devolved structures capacity in developing and realizing education strategic plans to provide quality Education services is a plus.
	Passion for our vision of democratizing the right for all children to succeed.
